channel.title: Just a suggestion kind of makes sense
channel.description: not that i want it i just want my server on the internet lol but don't you think you guys should be trying to make 1 utimate source eitheran exact carbon copy of rnuescpe or somthing better becouse making all new ones is kind of stupid you guys should make 1 huge group and make better updates for it every day not smushing and screwing everything up in every version hey i have a good idea you can make 1 ultimate moparscape source!

item.title: Just a suggestion kind of makes sense
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

whats is their not to get about hybridscape it just started as my idea to have a gui on whitescape server base nothing more

but now it is going to be the best private server ever, because we are developing it

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“james, post:6, topic:5662”][quote author=moparisthebest link=topic=7495.msg78889#msg78889 date=1153511294]
yes, it makes perfect sense to have a carbon copy of runescape, why dont you code it?

alot of us are working on hybridscape which is hosted at sourceforge, it will take some time but it will be perfect eventually
[/quote]
i rly dont get hybridscape. Are you going to be able to play with other people?[/quote]

your already able to play with other people…

item.title: Just a suggestion kind of makes sense
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

AnthraX Leader:

Lol not me but you guys lol… i dont even know how to write in java…

If you did, then maybe you would realize that anyone even the people who don’t know any java, have already thought of it. It’s not like everyone was running into walls before this topic lol. I’m not flaming by the way, but if anyone sees this, soon enough there will be plenty lol. I there are… just 1 or 2 problems with your idea. :rolleyes:

Read full topic
